About BlockMarketAI

We're building the future of decentralized data trading, where individuals and organizations can securely buy, sell, and trade data assets with complete ownership control.

Our Mission

To democratize data access and create a fair, transparent marketplace where data owners can monetize their assets while buyers can access high-quality datasets for research, AI training, and business intelligence.

Why Choose BlockMarketAI?

Secure & Private

End-to-end encryption ensures your data remains secure and private throughout all transactions.

Tokenized Assets

Data is tokenized on the blockchain, providing true ownership and transferability.

Decentralized

No central authority controls your data. You maintain complete ownership and control.

Instant Payments

Smart contracts enable instant, trustless payments in cryptocurrency.

Market Analytics

Real-time market data and analytics help you make informed trading decisions.

Privacy Control

Advanced privacy features give you complete control over data sharing.

Technology Stack

Built with cutting-edge blockchain and web technologies

Frontend

React.js, Next.js, Tailwind CSS

Blockchain

Ethereum, Solidity, Web3.js

Backend

Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB

Security

End-to-end encryption, MetaMask
